name: Samsung Galaxy S6
description: The Samsung Galaxy S6 runs on Android OS, v5.0 (Lollipop) and is powered by Quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A57 processor with 3GB RAM. It has a 5.1-inch, 1440 x 2560 pixel display. The Samsung Galaxy S6 also comes with a 16.0-megapixel camera that is able to record videos at 2160p. It comes with 32GB of built-in storage, and is able to support microSD cards of up to 128GB.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 2
description: The Xiaomi Redmi 2 runs on Android OS, v4.4.4 (KitKat) and is powered by Quad-core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A53 processor with 1/2GB RAM. It has a 4.7-inch, 720 x 1280 pixel display. The Xiaomi Redmi 2 also comes with a 8.0-megapixel camera that is able to record videos at 1080p. It comes with 8/16GB of built-in storage, and is able to support microSD cards of up to 32GB.

name: Motorola Moto X
description: The Moto X from Motorola is now arriving in Malaysia after being announced back in August 2013 and is expected to be a pretty efficient device for its price range - with a dual-core 1.7GHz Krait processor, Adreno 320 GPU, 720x1280 4.7" display, excellent 2GB of RAM, expandable storage up to 32GB, and a whopping 18 color options for the casing.
